comment: Obsolete as of 30-Jul-2023. Use ~ sb4b instead. One direction of a simplified definition of substitution when variables are distinct. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) Revise ~ df-sb . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 25-Jul-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
